p.span: At this time, all MCS campuses are closed and distance learning will continue for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. During the school closure, MCS is providing information and resources to assist families. Please click the link provided to learn more and stay updated.

a.title: Go to comments for School Closure and Updates

div.p: There are no upcoming events to display.

p.span: In order to comply with the Governor’s directive to shelter at home until April 20, 2020, the MCS District Office is closed. If you have an emergency, please call 601-499-0800. During this closure, we will be regularly checking email and voice mail.

a.title: Go to comments for Central Office Update

img.title: Free multi-meal packs for children available for pick up on Tuesdays and Thursdays at meal distribution locations
img.alt: Free multi-meal packs for children available for pick up on Tuesdays and Thursdays at meal distribution locations

a.title: Go to comments for MCS Provides Free Lunch for Children During School Closure

div.span: Students will be allowed to take their device home including the holidays. Please be aware that we will not be providing technical assistance during this time. If your laptop is lost or stolen, you will need to contact the police immediately and fill out the Theft Form to report it to school administration.
Parent/guardian will be responsible for full replacement cost of laptop if not reported to MCS personnel within calendar 3 days of missing the device.

a.title: Go to comments for Reporting Lost or Stolen Laptop

p.span: Joining the Madison County Schools family? Click here to learn more about enrollment and attendance zones. Find more detail information on school's site.
